Two 15-year-old boys have been arrested in connection with the murder of a man whose body was found on moorland in August.

Write a short summary for the following passage:
Craig Nelson, 34, also known as Craig Preston, was found dead at the Woodhead Tunnels in Derbyshire on 22 August.
South Yorkshire Police said a post-mortem examination revealed he died as a result of head injuries.
It brings the total number of arrests in connection with Mr Nelson's death to seven.
A man and a woman, Mohammed Bashir, 41, and Leonie Mason, 23, both of Holme Park Court in Huddersfield, are due to to appear at Sheffield Crown Court on Tuesday.
Two 15-year-old boys and a 15-year-old girl were arrested in connection with the murder on 30 August and released on bail a day later.
Summary:
